recipes.title: Melting Snowman
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Using a small cookie scoop, shape snowmen by dropping 1-tablespoon portions of whipped topping onto a waxed paper-lined baking sheet. Decorate with chocolate chips and jimmies to create faces. Freeze until firm. Place over servings of hot cocoa just before serving.                                        Yield: 1 dozen.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Melting Snowman in  Taste of HomeDecember/January 2013, p95                                                                                                                            Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend
